author: degenaro
msg: UIMA-4069 Redesign of JD toward the main goal of classpath separation for container (system) code.
Enable MetaCas prefix verification which is now fixed under Maven build.

author: jleroux
msg: Fixes the Poodle vulnerability following indications from "The Poodle fixer" at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5848
We will certainly have to evolve this in the future because this correction forces the protocol to TLSv1.2
